document_data.mainbody:
Wyvern Road was a street located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the mid-14 century DR.
Wyvern Road originated at Zhentil Keeps Trail Gate, taking over for the Zhentilar Trail inside the city walls. The road terminated at the unnamed gate that allowed passage into the Inner Quarter. Wyvern Road was located in northwest Zhentil Keep in the Common Quarter. Wyvern Road was part of a large convergence of other roads in Zhentil Keep that formed a large intersection just east of the Trail Gate. The other roads were Border Street, Fortress Street, Cobble Road, and Nool Street.
The road ran roughly west to east.
* The Trail Gate
* A Zhentilar guard post
